Package spock.lang

Class Snapshotter

java.lang.Object
spock.lang.Snapshotter
@Beta public class Snapshotter extends Object
Allows to perform snapshot testing.

Snapshots are stored in a file in the configured SnapshotConfig.rootPath with the same package structure as the specification class and grouped by the specification.

Since:
2.4

    • wrappedAs

      public Snapshotter wrappedAs(Snapshotter.Wrapper wrapper)
      Declares a Snapshotter.Wrapper for wrapping and unwrapping of the reference value.

      It is suggested that users create subclasses of Snapshotter with common wrapped types, instead of using this method directly.

    • normalizedWith

      public Snapshotter normalizedWith(Function<String,String> normalizer)
      Declares a Function for normalizing the reference value.

      The default normalization is line ending normalization.

    • assertThat

      public Snapshotter.Snapshot assertThat(String value)
      Specifies the actual value.

      Note: The value is normalized by the normalizer function, defaults to line ending normalization.

      Parameters:
      value - the actual value for assertions
